document_data.name: ''Bag of Nails''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Bag of Nails''''' was the enchanted [[quiver]] that belonged to its namesake, a [[tabaxi]] hunter [[Bag of Nails]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Bag of Nails''' enchantment increased its owner's speed drastically, being invaluable to [[ranger]]s and other users of [[bow]]s.
